title: Is this a new Perpetua font or?
content:
Is this a new Perpetua font or?  
Pls check the Attachment.  
Thank you.

Font: 

 Minion Pro 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091728/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [l.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091728/http:/typophile.com/files/l_0.png) | 161.36 KB |
author: balmain

comments.content: But the Minion (on myfonts.com) doesn't look that sharp, maybe it is a custom font?

Akira is right: it’s Minion, namely the [Condensed Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091728/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/adobe/minion_pro_condensed_display_regular/opentype_cff/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=100&sample_text=NINA%20RICCI&ft=liga&acs_pt=32) cut.
